sentences.english: The outer walls of the mounds are built to allow only eddies changing with low frequencies to penetrate deep within them.
sentences.chinese: 蟻丘的外牆設計成只讓低頻率的氣流滲入內部的結構。

sentences.english: We are anthill men upon an anthill world.
sentences.chinese: 我們是一羣螞蟻，擁擠在蟻丘之上。

sentences.english: The spatial distribution of F. cunicularia mounds was in random pattern.
sentences.chinese: 蟻丘的空間格局表現爲隨機分佈型。
